handlerJson.name: Product Modeler
handlerJson.title: Product modeler servisleri
handlerJson.description: PreAction, main, final action servislerini gösterir
handlerJson.query:
SELECT pmtd.TRANSACTIONCODE || ' - ' || pmtd.TRANSACTIONNAME || '
' || 'STARTER: ' || ds.SERVICENAME || '
' || 'MAINSERVICE: ' || ds2.SERVICENAME || '
' || 'PREACTION SERVICE: ' || NVL(ds3.SERVICENAME, '-') || '
' || 'CONTROL SERVICE: ' || NVL(ds4.SERVICENAME, '-') || '
' || 'UNDO PREACTION SERVICE: ' || NVL(ds5.SERVICENAME, '-') || '
' || 'FINAL ACTION SERVICE: ' || NVL(ds6.SERVICENAME, '-') AS FORMATTED_RESULT FROM URN.PRD_MODELER_TRX_DEF pmtd JOIN GEN.DAD_SERVICES ds ON ds.OID = pmtd.SERVICEOID AND ds.STATUS = 1 JOIN GEN.DAD_SERVICES ds2 ON ds2.OId = pmtd.MAINSERVICEOID AND ds2.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN GEN.DAD_SERVICES ds3 ON ds3.OID = pmtd.PREACTIONSERVICEOID AND ds3.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN GEN.DAD_SERVICES ds4 ON ds4.OID = pmtd.CONTROLSERVICEOID AND ds4.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN GEN.DAD_SERVICES ds5 ON ds5.OID = pmtd.UNDOPREACTIONSERVICEOID AND ds5.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN GEN.DAD_SERVICES ds6 ON ds6.OID = pmtd.FINALACTIONSERVICEOID AND ds6.STATUS = 1 WHERE (SELECT OID FROM GEN.DAD_SERVICES ds7 WHERE ds7.STATUS = 1 AND ds7.SERVICENAME = :p_input) IN (pmtd.SERVICEOID, pmtd.MAINSERVICEOID, pmtd.PREACTIONSERVICEOID, pmtd.CONTROLSERVICEOID, pmtd.UNDOPREACTIONSERVICEOID, pmtd.FINALACTIONSERVICEOID)
